Package com.github.gorkiiuss.uhcpantuflas.text

Class MinecraftTextBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.github.gorkiiuss.uhcpantuflas.text.MinecraftTextBuilder
public class MinecraftTextBuilder extends Object
The MinecraftTextBuilder class is used to construct complex Minecraft-formatted text strings. It allows you to build text with various formatting options such as bold, strikethrough, obfuscated, and color.
Since:
02/10/2023-ALPHA-0
Version:
0.0.1-ALPHA.0
